cn show group data

Shows the group data tree. This data tree is shared among all group members.

cn show local data

Shows the local data tree. This data tree is stored locally, and private to this actor.

cn show sent list

Shows the list of sent messages with their expiry date, envelope hash, and content hash.

… ordered by id
… ordered by date
… ordered by envelope hash

Sorts the list accordingly. By default, the list is sorted by id.

Syntax

Open
